summary: The story of a large U.S. Marines invasion task force bound for Guadalcanal in the Solomon Islands in 1942.
cast: Preston Foster|Lloyd Nolan|William Bendix|Richard Conte|Anthony Quinn|Richard Jaeckel|Roy Roberts|Minor Watson|Ralph Byrd|Lionel Stander|Reed Hadley|John Archer|Eddie Acuff|Warren Ashe|Martin Black|Marion Carl|Harry Carter|Tom Dawson|Jason Evers|Walter Fenner|Glenn Ford|Robert Ford|Paul Fung|Fred Graham|Louis Hart|George Holmes|Russell Hoyt|Selmer Jackson|Allen Jung|Charles Lang|Jack Luden|Miles Mander|David Peters|Bob Rose|Larry Thompson
title: Guadalcanal
